alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Midland; Reagan; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 11:01PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Glasscock, southeastern Midland, Reagan, southern Howard and eastern Upton Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1059 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Forsan to 19 miles southeast of Garden City to 11 miles southwest of Reagan County Airport. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Lake, Rankin, Garden City, Reagan County Airport, Stiles, Midkiff, Saint Lawrence and Best. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
